thread.title: Toshiba to sell image sensor business to Sony for $165 million Sources
thread.title_full: Toshiba to sell image sensor business to Sony for $165 million Sources

title: Toshiba to sell image sensor business to Sony for $165 million Sources
text:
Toshiba to sell image sensor business to Sony for $165 million: Sources 
Times Of India Saturday 24th October, 2015 
TOKYO: Toshiba is set to sell its image sensor business to Sony Corp for around 20 billion yen ($164.68 million) as part of a restructuring plan laid out earlier this year, sources with knowledge of the deal said....
